page.title: 19Leisure and Recreation
page.content:
In our survey of how children spend their free time we found everyone enjoyed doing different things. The most popular activity is{watching {television programmes.
Some of the other pastimes are riding bikes, playing chess, drawing, judo, swimming, stamp collecting, recorder playing, reading, horse riding and walking dogs.
We also made a survey of how adults spend their free time. We found that adults do fewer things in their free time than children. We thought they probably had less time. The most popular pastime is reading and gardening. Some of the other pastimes are D.I.Y, car maintenance, walking, computers, and watching television.
